articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Army Sub-unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Army Sub-unit
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), inspected a sub-unit under KPA Unit 1344.
					 He was briefed on its combat duty, readiness for combat and training.
					
					 He was satisfied with the fact that the sub-unit is preparing soldiers into stalwart ones capable of successfully carrying out any difficult combat duty by conducting intensive training under the simulated conditions of hard combat situation and conditions like an actual war on the basis of its deep research into the Party's Juche-based military tactics and combat action mode and methods.
					
					 He underlined the need for commanding and staff officers to develop their ability for promptly analyzing and judging combat situation and providing favorable combat circumstance, and find out all unfinished issues in combat preparations and take strict measures for them.
					
					 Stressing the need for the sub-unit to conduct effective training, always thinking about combat preparations awake and asleep in high alert, he called for putting training on the Juche, practical and scientific basis while steadily improving its contents and methods to suit the requirement and aspect of modern warfare and characteristics of the sub-unit's combat duty.
					
					 Saying the sub-unit has a very important duty to perform so that it should set an example for the entire army in combat and political training and unit commanding and management, he advanced important tasks which would serve as the guideline in rounding off combat preparations including the issue of preparing all soldiers as a-match-for-a-hundred fighters through intensive training and the issue of consolidating all combat positions to be an impregnable fortress with good camouflage.
					
					 He took warm care of the life of soldiers while going round the sub-unit's headquarters and bedrooms, rooms for education, wash-cum-bath rooms and mess halls of various companies newly built with the standard barracks designs ratified by the Party.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on neat barracks, he called for planting and cultivating more trees to turn the barracks and mountains around them into thick forest, woodland and orchard.
					
					 Expressing expectation and conviction that the service personnel of the sub-unit would firmly defend the socialist country by making thoroughgoing combat preparations, bearing deep in mind the honorable mission they assumed before the Party and the revolution, the country and its people, he gave them a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts before having a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So and Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Jong O
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Jong O
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Ri Jong O, winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and Kim Il Sung Prize, labor hero and people's artiste, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Congratulations to Nicaraguan President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nicaraguan President
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Daniel Ortega Saavedra upon his reelection as president of Nicaragua on Nov. 8.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in keeping with the requirement of the new era, the message sincerely wished the Nicaraguan president bigger success in his responsible work for the development of the country and the wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Pomiculture Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Pomiculture Held
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The national scientific and technological presentation in the field of pomiculture was opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Wednesday. It is under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present at the presentation were teachers, researchers, technicians and officials of the educational and science research institutions and production units of the pomiculture field including Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University, the Institute of Pomiculture of the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, the Kosan Combined Fruit Farm and the Ryongjon Fruit Farm.
					
					 The participants presented more than 150 papers and scientific and technical achievements gained in the course of scientific researches and production for radically increasing the fruit production.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kwak Pom Gi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials and working people in the educational and science research institutions and fruit production units.
					
					 The presentation will last till November 11.

articles.title: Anniversary of Opening of DPRK-Romania Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Opening of DPRK-Romania Diplomatic Ties Marked 
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- There took place a friendship shooting match at the Meari Shooting Gallery on Wednesday on the 68th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Romania. 
					 Present at the shooting match were Gheorghe Cioaca, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Romanian Embassy here, and embassy officials, Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					
					 They went round different places of the Meari Shooting Gallery.
					
					 In the indoor firing ranges they deepened friendly feelings, demonstrating their shooting skills.

articles.title: Mongolian Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
articles.content:
Mongolian Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
 Sariwon, November 9 (KCNA) -- Suren Tsoggerel, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did friendship labor at the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Jongbang Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City on Wednesday.
					 Being briefed on the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu associated with the farm, the guests looked round the house dedicated to the history of the farm.
					
					 They helped the farmers in bean threshing. 
					
					 During a break they talked with officials of the farm.

articles.title: Geographical Information Systems Introduced in DPRK
articles.content:
Geographical Information Systems Introduced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung University of the DPRK developed new applied geographical information systems, which have been recently introduced to various economic sectors of the country, proving effective.
					 They include an information system for managing forest resources on a nationwide scale, a land information system and a communications business aid system.
					
					 Those geographical information systems are now enjoying popularity in agriculture, land and environment protection and other fields.

articles.title: Many Tree Seeds Gathered in DPRK
articles.content:
Many Tree Seeds Gathered in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- More than one thousand tons of tree seeds have been gathered in the DPRK since the start of the autumn campaign of the general mobilization for land management.
					 The figure is 1.4 times higher than that in the same period last year.
					
					 The General Bureau of Forestry under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection took a detailed step for provinces, cities and counties to secure seeds of good tree varieties on a mass scale during this year's autumn land management campaign.
					
					 As a result, Ryanggang, Jagang, Kangwon and other provinces and Pyongyang City collected in a short period many seeds of various trees, including pine-nut tree.

articles.title: Dressing Plant of Junghung Mine Completed
articles.content:
Dressing Plant of Junghung Mine Completed
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The dressing plant of the Junghung Mine was rebuilt and went operational with due ceremony on Wednesday.
					 The reconstruction of the dressing plant made it possible to sharply boost mineral production and lay another strong foundation for contributing to building an economic power and improving the people's living standard.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on U.S. Failed Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on U.S. Failed Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Recently the director of National Intelligence conceded that the sanctions slapped by the Obama administration against the DPRK proved unworkable and it is impossible to force it to dismantle its nukes.
					 His assertion is given wide publicity because it disclosed the absurdity of the policy of sanctions and pressure persistently pursued by the successive administrations of the U.S. including the Obama administration against the DPRK for decades and admitted its failure.
					
					 The U.S. and other western media reported his comment as "realistic", "positive" and "honest".
					
					 The U.S. has resorted to nuclear blackmail and political and military provocation and left no means untried in its unheard-of campaign for harsh sanctions and pressure for the past several decades to bring down the DPRK advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 They have reached an extreme phase since Obama came to power.
					
					 But his policy of "strategic patience" has suffered a "strategic setback."
					
					 The above-said campaign desperately conducted by the U.S. and its vassal forces steadily pushed the DPRK to bolstering up its nuclear attack capability, far from "inducing" it to "scrap its nukes." On the contrary it emboldened Pyongyang to make a leap forward in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, instead of causing its social system to "collapse" or meet "self-ruin".
					
					 The strategic position of the DPRK which has undergone a dramatic change and all assets gained by it irrefutably prove that the American-style logic of strength and the jungle law never work on it.
					
					 It is quite natural that the U.S. policy towards the DPRK and its scenario to stifle it are bound to prove unjustifiable and go bust.
					
					 That is why major world media strongly urge the U.S. to make a policy switchover, quoting some of their comments that the Obama administration's policy toward the DPRK has failed, the U.S. should officially recognize north Korea as a de facto nuclear weapons state and follow the same policy towards it as those policies pursued towards other nuclear weapons states and it will be only the U.S. which will bump against the wall unless it makes a policy switchover as regards the nuclear issue of Korea, regardless of who wins the presidential election.
					
					 It is necessary for the U.S. to lend its ear to the public opinion growing strong even among the ruling quarters and think about it with reason.
					
					 It is high time it made up its mind how to deal with the nuclear power in the East.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Regime's Moves to Conclude Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence with Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Regime's Moves to Conclude Agreement on Protecting Military Intelligence with Japan
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday in a commentary denounces the south Korean authorities for deciding to resume negotiations on concluding an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan and for holding a working consultative meeting with Japan in Tokyo.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Such action is a sycophantic and traitorous act never to be pardoned as it allows the sworn-enemy Japanese militarists to stage a comeback to Korea and means zealous involvement in the creation of the triangular military alliance.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' decision to resume the above-said confab, vociferating about "rapid and effective response" to the "nuclear and missile threat from the north" would only result in facilitating the formation of the triangular military alliance as sought by the U.S. 
					
					 It would, at the same time, escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and increase the danger of a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a cynical ploy to divert elsewhere the attention of the angry public strongly demanding the resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Only a stern judgment by history awaits the traitors who have sold off the dignity and interests of the nation to foreign forces.

articles.title: Actions for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Unabated in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Actions of people from all walks of life in south Korea are going on for the resignation of Park Geun Hye, according to press reports.
					 Organizations under the Confederation of Trade Unions at a rally in Kwangju on Nov. 6 said that the function of the regime was paralyzed due to Choe Sun Sil's monopolization of administration with the backing of Park Geun Hye and thereby all has come not to believe in the "president".
					
					 On the same day the Headquarters of the Movement for Defending Democracy held a candlelight rally in Taejon and staged a demo demanding Park's resignation.
					
					 There took place similar rallies of civic and public organizations in Pusan, Ryongin of Kyonggi Province, Kyongju of North Kyongsang Province and other places on the same day all at once and the Taejon City Committee of the Minju Party held a rally demanding Park face up to the people's mindset.
					
					 On Nov. 7 citizens of all social standings in Seoul held a candlelight rally and staged a demo.
					
					 The Committee for Justice and Peace of the Kwangju Archdiocese of the Catholic Church held a rally on the situation in Kwangju and made a candlelight march, shouting slogans demanding Park's resignation.
					
					 Lawmakers of the Kwangju City Assembly held a press conference and shouted Park should step down at once as she is patronizing Choe Sun Sil and violating democracy.
					
					 The campaign for publishing declarations on the situation is also unabated. 
					
					 The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment, organizations for opposing THAAD deployment, the Ulsan Citizens Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye and other civic and pubic organizations held a joint press conference on Nov. 7.
					
					 At least 2 340 parents of students, professors, researchers and pastors staged a campaign for publishing the declaration on the situation in South Kyongsang Province.
					
					 More than 540 graduates who took part in the struggle while going to Seoul National University during the June people's resistance said in a declaration on the situation on Nov. 8 that Park should step down and this is the order of the people.
					
					 The Federation of Politics and Diplomacy of Youth and Children grouping students of 53 high schools across south Korea published a declaration on the situation in Youido, Seoul on Nov. 6 denouncing the Park regime on behalf of youth and children across south Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, wallpapers proposing strikes of students are pasted at universities one after another or activities calling for taking part in them are being conducted.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Park Geun Hye Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Park Geun Hye Step Down
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Nov. 7 said that more than 300,000 citizens took to the street at weekend, shouting "president, resign".
					 Park Geun Hye's "apology" on Oct. 25 sparked off a demonstration of 100,000 citizens and her "talk" on Nov. 4 caused actions of 300,000 citizens, the editorial said, adding the people are demanding the resignation of Park.
					
					 The editorial went on:
					
					 The situation has already been pushed to the phase of the June resistance and the April 19 revolution.
					
					 Park should step down of her own accord. This is the best option for her.

articles.title: Lawmakers of S. Korea Demand Park Geun Hye Take Her Hands off Administration
articles.content:
Lawmakers of S. Korea Demand Park Geun Hye Take Her Hands off Administration
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers from the opposition Minju Party of south Korea held a press conference outside Chongwadae on Nov. 6, according to reports.
					 A statement signed by 47 lawmakers was read out at the press conference.
					
					 The resentment of the people at the monopolization of administration by Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil has reached the point of explosion, the statement said.
					
					 Chongwadae and the regime are in the state of paralysis due to the unprecedented crisis and demands for resignation are growing but Park Geun Hye is turning her back on this, it charged.
					
					 It demanded Park take her hands off administration at once and receive investigation.
					
					 Next day lawmakers from the Kukmin Party also issued a statement at the "National Assembly" demanding Park step down.

articles.title: Only Way-out Is Reunification: S. Korean Professor
articles.content:
Only Way-out Is Reunification: S. Korean Professor
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Jo Tong Ho, professor at Ehwa Woman's University and member of the "Preparatory Committee for Unification" in south Korea, posted a paper titled "Present address of growing division of south and north in 2016" on the website of the "Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification", drawing great attention of public circles of south Korea, according to a report.
					 The present situation of the south Korean economy is showing limit under the situation of division of the south and the north of Korea, he said, adding it is essential for reunification in order to overecome this.
					
					 It is necessary to lead "growth under division" to "growth under reunification" as there is no expectation for the growth of the south Korean economy any longer at present, he noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Inhabitant Satirizes Puppet Security Authorities
articles.content:
S. Korean Inhabitant Satirizes Puppet Security Authorities
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- A south Korean inhabitant issued an article on Nov. 3 satirizing the puppet security authorities, according to a report.
					 He threw dog dung at the building of the puppet Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Oct. 31 in protest against the prosecution authorities' deceptive investigation into the case of monopolization of administration.
					
					 Immediately he was taken to the Socho Police Station in Seoul and released after intensive inquiry. He posted on website an article titled "I can say now" with burning resentment at the security authorities.
					
					 The article said he threw dog dung in demand of proper investigation as he was enraged at the prosecution's investigation.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Urges Park Geun Hye to Step down
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Urges Park Geun Hye to Step down 
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on Nov. 7 carried an editorial demanding Park Geun Hye's resignation.
					 Enraged at the monopolization of administration by Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil, citizens strongly demanded the resignation of Park, crowding Kwanghwamun Street in Seoul with candlelights in their hands, said the editorial.
					
					 Park suddenly designated the "prime minister" and the "Presidential chief of staff" in disregard of the people's will, it noted.
					
					 It is the candlelight action that was taken by ordinary citizens in protest against Park's behavior, saying they could not trust her as she is trying hard to tide over the crisis through procrastination in actuality, talking about responsibility.
					
					 The way of bringing the halted administration to normal is for Park to step down at once.

articles.title: Anti-Park Geun Hye Sentiment Grows Stronger among S. Korean Persons of Culture and Arts
articles.content:
Anti-Park Geun Hye Sentiment Grows Stronger among S. Korean Persons of Culture and Arts
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Nov. 7 in an editorial said that resentment at the Park Geun Hye regime is growing stronger among persons of culture and arts as regards the Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal.
					 It went on:
					
					 7,449 persons of at least 280 bodies, all-time high in the history of cultural and art circles in south Korea, issued a declaration on the situation on November 4 demanding the resignation of Park.
					
					 They expressed astonishment over the fact that the regime blacklisted persons of culture and arts in a bid to conduct political supervision and put artistes under its control by using it as a weapon.
					
					 The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism has turned into an organ for Park Geun Hye and her confidants instead of functioning as a public institution.

articles.title: Ultra-right Conservative Forces Reject Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Ultra-right Conservative Forces Reject Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Articles dealing with conservative forces' discontent with Park Geun Hye were posted on ultra-right websites of south Korea in succession.
					 According to the south Korean Newsis on Nov. 7, the ultra-right conservative forces installed websites in 2010 fully supporting the chief executive and the ruling party over sensitive issues. However, these days a series of articles denouncing Park Geun Hye with regard to the disclosure of "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" were posted on them.
					
					 Owing to Park Geun Hye alone, all the conservative forces are fated to die, the articles said, underscoring the need to force Park to step down and calling on the ruling party to opt for impeachment of Park.
					
					 Composite photos showing Choe Sun Sil controlling Park Geun Hye continue to appear on websites.

articles.title: S. Korean Professor and Lawmaker Call for Revolution for New Society
articles.content:
S. Korean Professor and Lawmaker Call for Revolution for New Society
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Ok, professor at Hansin University of south Korea, demanded the resignation of Park Geun Hye and held today's struggle is a revolution for building a new society at a rally held in Seoul on Nov. 5, according to press reports.
					 It is possible to build a new society only when we strongly express the will of all citizens to put an end to all powers which have oppressed us, Kim said.
					
					 Jong Tong Yong, lawmaker from the Kukmin Party, in an article on Nov. 7 said that Kim's appeal saw through the essence of the present situation.
					
					 The people should put an end to the oppression of all systems binding their existence by giving vent to their resentment, he noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Urges U.S. to Withdraw Its Scenario to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Urges U.S. to Withdraw Its Scenario to Deploy THAAD
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial on Nov. 7 accused the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea of blustering that THAAD would be deployed in south Korea in 8-10 months to come and the scale of its battery would be bigger than that on Guam.
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. assistant secretary of State for East Asia-Pacific affairs asserted that the schedule for deploying THAAD will remain unchanged, the editorial noted, adding: 
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is working hard to meet its own interests, irrespective of chaos in south Korea.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly concerned for south Korea, it should withdraw its scenario of THAAD deployment, instead of expanding its scale.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Disband Chongryon Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Disband Chongryon Assailed
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are getting ever more frantic with the moves against the DPRK and Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan), malignantly pulling up the DPRK over its measures for bolstering up the nuclear force for self-defence to protect its sovereignty and vital rights and guarantee peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the Japanese reactionaries torment Chongryon, a dignified overseas compatriots' organization of the DPRK, and Koreans in Japan and even threaten their rights to existence.
					
					 The reckless acts of the Japanese political gangsters against Chyongryon are going beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 The confrontation with the DPRK pursued by the Japanese reactionaries, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, proved totally bankrupt while it has emerged a nuclear power in the East. Much upset by this, they are set to take revenge upon it by escalating state-sponsored terrorism against Chongryon even by discarding the veil of "law-governing" and "human rights." This is nothing but a mean behavior of the narrow-minded Japanese politicians.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries should bear in mind that it is a serious mistake and daydream to bring down Chongryon which is under the protection of Juche Korea reliably defending its dignity and sovereignty and fully demonstrating its might under the unfurled great banner of Songun.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The Meeting of Koreans in Germany Remembering the Ferry Sewol Disaster, the Korea Consultative Council and the "European Solidarity of Korean Nation", organizations of Koreans in Europe, and Koreans in America issued a statement on Nov. 4.
					 Park Geun Hye has monopolized administration and committed tremendous theft while adding to crimes such as a spy case, ferry Sewol disaster, disgraceful "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery and peasant Paek Nam Gi case, the statement said.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place a meeting of Koreans in the U.S. outside the White House on Nov. 5 demanding Park Geun Hye's resignation.
					
					 The participants said in a statement that Park proved herself she had no qualifications as "president" during her office.
					
					 The "action of overseas Koreans for the resignation of Park Geun Hye and recovery of democracy" held rallies in New York, Chicago, Los Angeles, London, Manchester, Berlin and Dublin from Nov. 4 to 6 demanding Park Geun Hye step down as demanded by the people.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign media dedicated articles to the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th founding anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The October issue of the Chinese Hong Kong Magazine International Link carried articles illustrated with photos of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and photos showing the invincible military muscle of the DPRK.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "Eternal leader of the WPK" termed the energetic ideological and theoretical activities of Kim Jong Il encyclopedic ones covering all fabrics of social life, giving a detailed account of many works authored by him to encourage and accelerate the global cause of socialism and the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 It is one of the prominent exploits of Kim Jong Il that he firmly consolidated the harmonious whole of the party and the popular masses, the magazine said, adding that he is always alive along with the ever-victorious WPK.
					
					 The magazine also carried an article terming the 70 odd years covered by the WPK the course of attaining the final goal of the DIU.
					
					 The October 14th to 16th issue of the Brazilian paper Hora do Povo, the October issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra in their articles dealt with the formation of the DIU and its historical significance and praised the WPK for leading the service personnel and people of the DPRK to work epochal miracles and innovations.

articles.title: U.S. Paper Carries Cartoon Making Fun of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
U.S. Paper Carries Cartoon Making Fun of Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- The New York Times on Nov. 6 carried a cartoon making fun of Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil's scandal in which they monopolized administration. 
					 A robot named "Park Geun Hye" written in English appeared in the cartoon.
					
					 A person who looks like a media person puts a ladder on the robot and takes off the lid to show its head.
					
					 When seeing the inside of the robot by using a torch, the man is astonished to watch the woman controlling the brainless robot on the seat written "Choe Sun Sil" inside its head.
					
					 Below the ladder, a policeman with a club is watching the person above it. 
					
					 The New York Times in the cartoon carried an explanation "An advisor to the president of south Korea was arrested and charged with using her influence to extort large sums from Korean companies".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed with due ceremony in Russia on Nov. 3.
					 Present there were officials of Juche idea study organizations in 11 areas including the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and other masses.
					
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The chairman said the Juche idea followers of Russia deem it their duty to conduct positive events praising Kim Jong Il for his great contributions to the Korean revolution and accomplishment of the cause of global independence, on the fifth anniversary of his demise. He went on:
					
					 The Russian people are remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il who greatly contributed to developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The progressive people are convinced of the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and inevitability of its victory thanks to his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He firmly defended Korean socialism despite all moves of the imperialists with his original Songun politics during the most difficult Arduous March and the forced march.
					
					 In order to achieve genuine independence and sovereignty the world progressive people should make deep study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona una subunidad adscrita a Unidad 1344 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona una subunidad adscrita a Unidad 1344 de EPC
Pyongyang, 9 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la subunidad adscrita a la Unidad 1344 del EPC.
					El Comandante Supremo escucho el parte sobre la mision, el estado de disposicion de combate y de ejercicio de la subunidad.
					
					Expuso la satisfaccion de que la subunidad esta adiestrando a los militares para que estos cumplan con exito cualesquier misiones dificiles al realizar el entrenamiento intenso en las complicadas situaciones y condiciones combativas semejantes a la guerra real basandose en el estudio profundo de los originales metodos de combate de nuestro partido, el modo de accion de combate y las tacticas de combate.
					
					Los comandantes y los funcionarios del Estado Mayor tienen que cultivar la capacidad de analizar y ajuiciar rapidamente la situacion de combate y preparar el ambiente de combate favorable, dijo el Presidente y subrayo la necesidad de tomar las medidas estrictas para solucionar los problemas pendientes en los preparativos de combate.
					
					Senalo que tienen que mantener el alto estado preparativo, pensar siempre en los preparativos de combate y hacer en forma sustancial los ejercicios efectivos. Y agrego la necesidad de mejorar sin cesar el contenido y los metodos de entrenamiento conforme a los requisitos y formas de la guerra moderna y las caracteristicas del cumplimiento de las misiones de combate de la subunidad y, al mismo tiempo, de materializar estrictamente la originalidad, la eficiencia y la cientificidad de los ejercicios.
					
					Por su mision importantisima, la subunidad tiene que ser ejemplo de todo el ejercito en el entrenamiento combativo y politico y en el mando y administracion de la unidad, reitero el Comandante y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en el acabado de los preparativos de combate incluyendo el problema de preparar a todos los militares como los combatientes capaces de luchar uno contra cien enemigos mediante el ejercicio intenso, consolidar las posiciones de combate como fortalezas inexpugnables y disfrazarlas bien.
					
					Recorrio la comandancia de la subunidad, los cuarteles, salas de educacion, banos y comedores de varias companias, nuevamente construidos segun el diseno del cuartel normal firmado por el partido y atendio con el sentimiento paternal la vida de los uniformados.
					
					Mirando los cuarteles construidos de manera proporcionada, ordeno sembrar mucho mas arboles para reforestar las montanas alrededores de los cuarteles.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares de la subunidad defenderan con firmeza la patria socialista guardando la honrosa mision asumida ante el partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo y manteniendo la invariable disposicion de combate, les dono como recuerdo los binoculos y el fusil automatico y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Tiene lugar competencia de tiro de amistad Corea-Rumania
articles.content:
Tiene lugar competencia de tiro de amistad Corea-Rumania
Pyongyang, 9 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Centro de Tiro Meari la competencia de tiro de amistad dedicada al 68o aniversario de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Rumania.
					En la ocasion participaron el encargado de negocios a.i. Gheorghe Cioaca y otros miembros de la embajada rumana en la RPDC y el viceministro Pak Myong Guk y otros funcionarios del MINREX de la RPDC.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron varios lugares del centro acondicionado modernamente y estrecharon la amistad demostrando sus habilidades en las salas de tiro bajo techo.
